author: Thoughty2
description: Bacopa Monnieri, also known as Brahmi, has been praised in Ayurvedic medicine for enhancing the communication rate of the nervous system. It can also increase the growth of nerve endings and is thought to have antioxidant properties to prevent brain degradation But how effective is it? We may need more trials to find out.
title: Should We Sit Up and Pay Attention to This Cognitive Enhancer?
